meanings.definition: The quality or state of causing harm or injury.
meanings.sent1: Her hurtfulness towards others led to many conflicts.
meanings.sent2: The hurtfulness of his words left a lasting impact on her.
meanings.sent3: Despite his hurtfulness, she found a way to forgive him.
meanings.sent4: The hurtfulness of the situation cut deep into their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The hurtfulness of the betrayal was like a sharp knife in her heart.

meanings.definition: The act of causing pain or suffering.
meanings.sent1: The hurtfulness of the accident left him in agony.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't bear the hurtfulness of seeing her pet in pain.
meanings.sent3: The hurtfulness of the prank made them all burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The hurtfulness of the truth hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The hurtfulness of the loss weighed heavily on their hearts.
